definition.script: node('maven') { stage('Preparation') { // for display purposes // Get some code from a GitHub repository git 'https://github.com/jglick/simple-maven-project-with-tests.git' } stage('Build') { // Run the maven build sh "mvn -Dmaven.test.failure.ignore clean package" } stage('Results') { junit '**/target/surefire-reports/TEST-*.xml' archive 'target/*.jar' } }
